title: S- On Sona no mastery 7 token
body: I previously played a game as Sona support and received an S i went to my hex-tech crafting and there was no mastery 7 Token{{champion:37}}

replies.body: S- doesn't give you mastery 7 tokens, you need S or S+.
You can only get mastery 7 tokens from S or S+ grades, not S-
S and S+ are they only ways to get rank 7 tokens. It even states it on the token.
you need an S not and S-
